TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Looks cool! BTW, isn't it "Produvka odin", instead of "Protyajka odin"?

Yeah, I know about it, but if I'll write there all comands there will be problems with too big amount of words. And, of course, there are 2.5 russians in the thead, so lots of people do not know meanings of these words.

Hello again!

Ermm... Is that a question? I'm so sorry I didn't understood you correctly. Can you reformulate the question, please?

And you new "Salyut" looks good!

Here is replica of the N-1 LK/LOK or just "Soviet Moon program". And I had some problem with crashed and saves, so camera and ladder on the LK... They... Evaporated. Sorry.

http://imgur.com/a/cU6bD

I do not know where my English went on that night! I meant to ask "Did you perform a skip re-entry?"

That's a great album, I have not seen many Soviet moon mission attempts and this one is really well executed!

Thanks! I took the technique of the plumbing from a Blender bridge tutorial

I don't think it's bad that it's a reference to you, as it means that you have your own style, whisch is liked by many. Although, I must admit that something white-ish will be more fitting with pFairings.

Hey everyone, congrats on Philae!

Congrats to ESA!

We now wait for surface pictures!

Looks really good! We are very, very far away from having too many KK objects, please make more!

Glad they are liked

I enjoy it too much to not make more! Hahaha...

si si, ho capito

Not really, Google translate cannot do Russian..

I'd like to hear people's opinions:

Do you mind if I switch only to Kerbal Stuff for hosting? It will help streamline updates and keeping a future changelog.

Of course if I can get some time to set a GitHub up, that becomes available also.

Edited November 12, 2014 by Beale

Yeah, I know about it, but if I'll write there all comands there will be problems with too big amount of words. And, of course, there are 2.5 russians in the thead, so lots of people do not know meanings of these words.

Yeah, that's just me rambling.

Don't take it too serious.

"Did you perform a skip re-entry?"

Kind of. Of course, ingame it is imposible (Or very-very difficult) to perform "double re-entry" as "Zond". I just slowed down my orbital velocity by first re-entry then, after 1 minute I performed de-orbital burn and landed.

Do you mind if I switch only to Kerbal Stuff for hosting?

It's your mod, you can do everything you want (In my opinion).

perhaps instead of orange, you could go with dark green for the flavor color on the R7
Ah yes. B/c the orange/grey is actually already used by Orionkermin's stuff, and while that's not a huge issue, a bit more variety would be nice :-)

Apologies I missed these two posts. Yes, a dark green is a good choice! I like it.

Kind of. Of course, ingame it is imposible (Or very-very difficult) to perform "double re-entry" as "Zond". I just slowed down my orbital velocity by first re-entry then, after 1 minute I performed de-orbital burn and landed.

This is what I thought a skip re-entry was! After further reading, yeah i do not think a real one is possible without FAR (So the capsule can produce lift).

No news, but something a little fun.

Probe was launched with solar panels folded, lets send a manned mission to unfold them!

I think this is my first "really precise" landing

I have a self-imposed rule not to spawn Kerbals on the Mun, so it is required they are sent from Kerbin!

Great! That's a pretty smart modular design

Thanks...

You mean you first go to 300km then lower to 100km and dock? Is this a good way to do things? I'm not so good at rendezvous and docking, so I may try.

Ohhh, my bad eng...

300km orbit - more warp.

I use MechJeb and autopilot when docking equally perform at a higher orbit. Typically at 271 km. So instead I go straight to 300/300.

Yeah, I know about it, but if I'll write there all comands there will be problems with too big amount of words. And, of course, there are 2.5 russians in the thead, so lots of people do not know meanings of these words.

I took it to mean that they would like if the pipe was part of the 3d model and not just texture, which I don't agree with. Having a little bump in the mesh could make building with the part awkward is some cases.

The pipe is currently 3D, it was a little harder to see in other shots.

The bump on the mesh is no problem, the "real" mesh is the collider, which is just a plain cylinder (You cannot touch the pipe physically).
